lexUnit.name: stout.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: rather fat or heavily built.

sentence.text: She had always been stout , endowed he had thought .
She registered little initially , beyond the fact that Kenneth was tall and stout and Colette was small and thin .
Mr Hodges , the butler , was stout as well as dignified , Mrs Redfern was a widow but plump and jolly for all that , and Ivy was a bit skinny .
Voronov-Vaux , a stout , balding fellow , was plainly a sensualist .
At that moment the door to one of the partitioned offices opened and a stout , smartly suited figure emerged .
It was easy to ridicule him -- his battered old topee , his stout figure , the perspiration which never seemed to dry up however often he mopped his bald pate .
With them was always Maria , a mongol girl who was about nine but looked older because of her stout figure , short , thick neck and large head .
The stout , middle-aged men in black glasses do not appear until ten o'clock , with brief-cases or small leather bags .
A stout middle-aged man sat at a corner playing a red squeeze box and working a pedal with one foot which made a row of wooden puppets dance .
The stout man ran into the cottage and phoned for the police and then for other keepers to come to Smiling Meadow .
I ought to have said , that though not a stout young man , he has always been very healthy , and has no dread of confinement .
The hand dropped from his shoulder , and Patrick glanced around , massaging his stiffened muscle , to see a broad , stout man grinning at him .
The small stout man grinned at Patrick .
In answer to his ring the door was opened by a short , stout woman dressed severely in black .
At ten-thirty-five , a stout woman in a blue overall with plain , pale-blue collar and cuffs to denote her seniority came up with a clipboard and said , ` Tim and Anna .
I stopped two stout middle-aged women carrying laden shopping-bags and asked them if they knew where I could find rooms to rent .
She looked back , and saw that Tante HÃ©loise was being led away on the arm of the stout woman .
The keeper and his stout companion acted without asking questions .
His short , stout body was very still as he stared down into Ward 's face .
Round in childhood , she became stout in middle age and the auburn of her hair was maintained by henna .
